pullRequest.title: [FLINK-16530][docs] Add documentation about "GROUPING SETS" and "CUBE" support in streaming mode
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
Add documentation about "GROUPING SETS" and "CUBE" support in streaming mode. They are already
supported since 1.9, but we missed to update the documentation.
Brief change log
update the documentation.
Verifying this change
N/A

Anything that affects deployment or recovery: JobManager (and its components), Checkpointing, Kubernetes/Yarn/Mesos, ZooKeeper: (yes / no / don't know)
The S3 file system connector: (yes / no / don't know)

Documentation

Does this pull request introduce a new feature? (yes / no)
If yes, how is the feature documented? (not applicable / docs / JavaDocs / not documented)

commit.message: [FLINK-16530][docs] Add documentation about "GROUPING SETS" and "CUBE" support in streaming mode

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -471,14 +471,16 @@ SELECT DISTINCT users FROM Orders Grouping sets, Rollup, Cube
- Batch + Batch Streaming + Result Updating {% highlight sql %} SELECT SUM(amount) FROM Orders GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((user), (product)) {% endhighlight %} +

Note: Streaming mode Grouping sets, Rollup and Cube are only supported in Blink planner.
